classification: Drawings; Collages / Assemblages; Works on Paper
description: four drawings on square paper with torn perforations; and two collage pages; a) graphite drawing of a spiral shape like woven reeds, feather taped to verso; b) graphite drawing of a spiral woven shape; c) graphite drawing of a spiral woven shape; d) graphite and watercolor drawing with gold knot at center, blue circle, surrounded by gray rectangles; e) collage of magazine photos of spiral school of fish; craters, concentric rings, illustration of spiral of Archimedes, the equiangular spiral; e) collage of a brain illustration, photos of meandering river, blue tangled nerve bodies(?), with a quote by Picasso written in graphite: "EVERYONE WANTS TO UNDERSTAND ART. WHY NOT / TRY TO UNDERSTAND THE SONG OF / A BIRD?"
dimension:
5 3/4 × 6 in. (14.6 × 15.2 cm) (image, sheet, 4 drawings: a-d)
12 × 9 in. (30.5 × 22.9 cm) (image, sheet, 2 collages: e-f)
title: Spiral Movements of Change/Mandala (study)
